docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Jan. 11. (Associated Press).--A group of American bankers representing the National City Bank of New York has offered the Uruguayan Government a loan of $8,000,000 to $10,000,000 which to buy the British-owned water works company of...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Jan. 11. (Associated Press).--A group of American bankers representing the National City Bank of New York has offered the Uruguayan Government a loan of $8,000,000 to $10,000,000 which to buy the British-owned water works company of Montevideo.

headline.main: OFFERS URUGUAY A LOAN; National City Bank Ready to Lend $8,000,000 to $10,000,000.

headline.main: HARDING AIDS WORK FOR BRAZILIAN FAIR; Handsome American Building to Be Used for Embassy After the Celebration. COL. COLLIER TO SAIL SOON J.H. Kirby Named on Commission in Place of Col. M.B. Ochs, Who Is Unable to Serve.

docs.snippet: With the dealings in the European exchanges heavier than on any of the preceding days of the week, yesterday's trading also brought with it some recoveries and a more stable market for most classes of remittances.
docs.lead_paragraph: With the dealings in the European exchanges heavier than on any of the preceding days of the week, yesterday's trading also brought with it some recoveries and a more stable market for most classes of remittances.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE.; Market Active, With Recoveries in Most Rates--Francs Rally but Sag Later.

docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, Jan. 14 (Associated Press). --Paul Hymans, President of the Council of the League of Nations, presented to the Council this morning a telegram which Cardinal Mercier, Primate of Belgium, had received from the Protestant community and the Armenian Catholic Patriarchate of Constantinople stating ...
docs.abstract: Dr Rajchman tells League of Nations of number of typhus cases

headline.main: 120,000 ARMENIANS TO LEAVE TURKEY; Ask League Council, Through Cardinal Mercier, for Ships to Transport Them. COUNCIL TAKES A RECESS Adjourns Until April 25, Having Created Advisory Commission on White Slave Traffic.

docs.snippet: Rates for European exchanges yesterday were decidedly, firm, strength in Italian and German remittances being notable, the lire going to 4.43  cents at the close, which is the best for the year to date, while the mark advanced a full two points, at...
docs.lead_paragraph: Rates for European exchanges yesterday were decidedly, firm, strength in Italian and German remittances being notable, the lire going to 4.43 cents at the close, which is the best for the year to date, while the mark advanced a full two points, at 55 3/8-100ths of a cent above previous closing.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE.; All Rates Move Higher in Quiet Market--Italain and German Feature.
FOREIGN EXCHANGE; Market Heavy, With Fractional Losses General--Chinese Rates Move Up Slightly.
